timeline.bodyText: I don't think this needs to be a field. Just instantiate as a local variable in call(). I know you'll going to use it in a finally block, so you can create it before try {.
timeline.author: chanseokoh
chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: great catch. On second thought, I think it should be private since it's only accessed in this class.
replies.author: mpeddada1

replies.bodyText: Appu put globalOptions as protected, so probably there's a reason for that. But I'm not sure about CommandSpec. Just do some actual jib jar run to confirm you see correct output.
replies.author: chanseokoh

replies.bodyText: Ah good point, running  jib --target=docker://jib-cli-image jar unknown.jar returned the expected output : [ERROR] The file path provided does not exist: unknown.jar. I think it could be okay?
replies.author: mpeddada1
